title: Continue to get unknown error
body: I have tried everything, but I continue to get an unknown error that prevents me from connecting to the chat, how do I fix this

replies.body: Am i the only one that also affect my hextech crafting and store?

if you wanna play with your friend, go into game invite list, then type in there username manually then press enter they should show up then just press invite players
